ing: 2 (15.25 ounce) cans mango pulp, or mango slices with juice
des: "A lot of recipes tell you to use fresh mangos.  THIS is the mistake!  I've been doing it that way for years and it is very difficult to get around the chalkiness of the mangos.  By going to the pulp, it is a no brainer!"
ins: Pour mangos, yogurt, milk, and ice into the bowl of a blender.  Blend until smooth.
